thread.title: Cathy Brogdon
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Cathy Brogdon

author: Cathy Brogdon
title: Cathy Brogdon
text: It is so nice to have meals planned for you with all the ingredients delivered right to your door! I can now cook nice meals without the fuss of planning and shopping! I have only had one issue with my produce not being fresh in many months of using Hello Fresh and they made it right by offering a credit off my next order.
